translations: v．重新召集，重新开会：指在一段时间的中断后，再次召集会议或集会。

sentences.sentence: When it reconvenes, those bills will have to start again from scratch.
sentences.translation: 国会复会时，这些议案将不得不重新起草。

sentences.sentence: When the House reconvenes on January 13th, it will elect a new speaker.
sentences.translation: 当1月13日议院重新召开的时候，将选举出一位新的发言人。

sentences.sentence: A final agreement is unlikely before October, when parliament reconvenes.
sentences.translation: 10月份议会重新召集后，合约才有可能最终敲定下来。
